title.en: To Expect - Certainty and Supposition (Esperar con certeza)
title.es: To Expect - Certainty and Supposition (Esperar con certeza)

description.en: Learn to use 'expect' for certainty and supposition. EXPECT = esperar with certainty (arranged beforehand) or 'suponer' (assumptions). Different from HOPE (wishes) and WAIT (physical waiting). 'That' is often omitted.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'expect' para certeza y suposición. EXPECT = esperar con certeza (acordado previamente) o 'suponer' (suposiciones). Diferente de HOPE (deseos) y WAIT (esperar físicamente). 'That' se suele omitir.

prompt.es: Estoy esperando una llamada a las seis.

exercises.solution: I'm expecting a phone call at six.

tip.en: Use 'expect' for arranged/certain events, not wishes or physical waiting.
tip.es: Usa 'expect' para eventos acordados/ciertos, no deseos o espera física.

prompt.es: Te espero a las siete para cenar.

exercises.solution: I'll expect you at seven o'clock for dinner.

tip.en: Use 'expect' for arranged/certain events, not wishes or physical waiting.
tip.es: Usa 'expect' para eventos acordados/ciertos, no deseos o espera física.

exercises.solution: I wasn't expecting you.

tip.en: Use 'expect' for arranged/certain events, not wishes or physical waiting.
tip.es: Usa 'expect' para eventos acordados/ciertos, no deseos o espera física.

exercises.solution: He wasn't expecting that.

tip.en: Use 'expect' for arranged/certain events, not wishes or physical waiting.
tip.es: Usa 'expect' para eventos acordados/ciertos, no deseos o espera física.

exercises.solution: She's expecting twins.

tip.en: 'Expecting' is used for pregnancy - a certain biological process.
tip.es: 'Expecting' se usa para embarazo - un proceso biológico cierto.

exercises.solution: I expect you're tired.

tip.en: Use 'expect' for suppositions/assumptions. 'That' is often omitted.
tip.es: Usa 'expect' para suposiciones/presunciones. 'That' se suele omitir.
